title: Reposition a Container in the Yard
description: A container was stacked in the wrong block. A planner needs to create a job to move it to the correct location.

tasks.description: Identify the container that needs to be moved and its incorrect current location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies the container and sees it is in the reefer block but is a standard dry container.

tasks.description: Find a suitable empty slot in the correct yard block for that container type.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner finds an open slot in a standard container block.

tasks.description: Create a re-stow work order for a yard crane to move the container from the old location to the new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is generated in the TOS to execute the move.
